attributes.action: stop drug addicts getting free council propertys
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why should drug users be helped with housing?? There are people who work who have NOT had a baby,been to prison or are drug addicts that need help to get homed as they simply cant afford it yet they work hard!! but if you are any of the above you get given help without a question!
